alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 3:04PM MDT until March 20 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin
